title: Vanguards of Health Care: Cognito’s Gamma Waves Activate Brain
description: Understand every aspect of the global economy – and know how to make your next move.
content: “If you can drive the brain's naturally occurring activity, what you can get is the biologic expression that is important for brains to maintain and protect themselves.,” CEO Christian Howell explains to Bloomberg Intelligence. In this Vanguards of Health Care episode, Howell sits down with BI analyst Matt Henriksson for an in-depth interview on Cognito Therapeutics, its Spectris non-invasive therapeutic intervention that is designed to use gamma waves to preserve brain structure and function, starting with Alzheimer’s patients, and the promise of its Hope study. He also discusses how his experiences in the Navy and at Medtronic under former CEO Omar Ishak guided his “fidelity to the mission” mantra.
summary:
The CEO of the company, Christian Howell, discusses his involvement in the company's Spectris non-invasive therapeutic intervention, which uses gamma waves to preserve brain structure and function. He also discusses his experiences in the Navy and at Medtronic.
